reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress pretty and comfortable.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit, very flattering
items.body: I am not very fond of ‚Äútight fit‚Äù clothing. I don‚Äôt have a figure one wants to look at closely. But this dress complements my figure nicely. It hugs the body, but doesn‚Äôt show my flaws. Wow. Now that is rare! It is stretchy material, so it will fit me for a while, even as I am loosing weight. It is made of material like a t-shirt, but stretchy. It is supremely comfortable! I ordered XL. . I am 5‚Äô7‚Äù, 180 lbs. I wear bra size 42 C. I usu fit a size 18, but in some brands size 20. My body is a pear üçê shape. Smaller upper straight down to wide, square hips. I am NOT fond of the sleeves/cuffs. It‚Äôs hard to see in the pictures, but the cuufs are very loose, bell shaped. They drape. It is a pretty feminine look‚Ä¶. But functionally those cuffs make me crazy, as they get in my way as I work, cook, etc. But that‚Äôs just my personal preference. Others might like this feature. I think I‚Äôm going to order the sleeveless version of the same dress & wear a little sweater with it. I wish they made a short sleeve‚Ä¶. Or better yet, a 3/4 sleeve version. That could be worn year round!! Read more
items.author: Peter Pumpkin Eater

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Arms too long
items.body: Pretty dress but the arms were very long. Disproportionally to the dress. Read more
items.author: Diane Slama

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pockets and great fit
items.body: Love this dress! Fabric is perfect for fall and winter. Fits true to size and has POCKETS! ‚ù§Ô∏è Read more
items.author: Evelyn

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Everything perfect but the material
items.body: Perfect in every way but one: I dont like the material. Read more
items.author: Belinda Goldberg

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: I purchased this dress for my daughter to attend a funeral. The dress was perfect for the occasion and very elegant for the price. The material is stretchy and soft, which was comfortable for her and she looked beautiful in it. Read more
items.author: Brittany

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Above ankle length but otherwise okay
items.body: I wanted to love this dress especially after seeing other reviews but once I got it I felt like no one was showing the length or even talking about the length. I am around 5'4" and this dress was coming up above my ankles. Since it was a maxi and all the reviews didnt mention it being slightly shorter I ordered and although I loved the sleeves and top portion of the dress honestly the length just wasn't right for me at all. So I would keep in mind that if youre looking for a longer maxi. Also I would say for size its pretty true to size. Just keep in mind its meant to be tighter fit up top Read more
items.author: Anonymous

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Wonky waist
items.body: Waist hits in an odd place. Not low enough for dropped wais. Too low to hit waist area. Color red is great. Like the sleeves. Mid section is not gathered exactly but also not smooth. Not sure what they were going for. Read more
items.author: Natillie Vos

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I followed the size recommendation provided
items.body: Exactly what I hoped for. great fit and very comfortable Read more
items.author: Janet Karson

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Ruched Boat Neck Maxi Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Ruched Boat Neck Maxi Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Khaki, Blue, Royal Blue, Army Green, Dark Blue, Black, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
